mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, TITLE, WRITER, PASS, CONTENTS) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{pass}, #{contents})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS RNUM, BOARD_NO, TITLE, WRITER, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS WRITE_DATE, HIT_CNT FROM BOARD WHERE DEL_YN = 1
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
AND WRITER LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
AND CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
) B
SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS WRITE_DATE, HIT_CNT FROM BOARD WHERE DEL_YN = 1 AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN 'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END AS RESULT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND PASS = #{pass}
